hero_body: GyanShala is a low-bandwidth, AI-powered education companion built for government schools, NGOs, and community classrooms. It helps teachers deliver structured lessons, revision, and career guidance even when internet access is patchy.
feature_low_connectivity_body: Lessons are optimized to work smoothly on 2G/3G networks, with offline-friendly content and lightweight media so learners never miss a class. Downloadable modules and bite-sized videos keep data usage low while still feeling rich and interactive.
feature_multilang_body: Switch between regional languages so students can learn in the language they understand best, including local scripts and examples rooted in everyday rural life.
feature_ai_body: AI-assisted summaries, practice questions, and step-by-step explanations that adjust to each learner's pace, helping students revise smarter and teachers save time.
supported_languages_list: English, Hindi, Bengali, Tamil, Telugu, Marathi
how_it_helps_body: GyanShala brings together curriculum-aligned lessons, practice sets, and guidance content so that teachers, volunteers, and parents can run effective study circles in villages and small towns.
how_it_helps_point_teachers: Teachers get ready-to-use lesson flows and homework suggestions.
how_it_helps_point_students: Students get revision, quizzes, and concept explanations in their own language.
how_it_helps_point_community: Communities can track engagement and support learners who are at risk of dropping out.
made_for_rural_schools_body: Support teachers with structured digital content that fits into regular classroom routines without needing computer labs or expensive devices.
made_for_ngos_body: Run after-school programs, bridge courses, and foundational literacy and numeracy camps with ready-made modules.
made_for_parents_body: Use simple, guided practice sessions to keep children learning at home, even when schools are far away or timing is irregular.
footer_note_line1: Designed for schools, NGOs & community centres.
footer_note_line2: Bring GyanShala to your village and keep every learner connected to quality learning, guidance, and opportunities.
auth_subtitle: Use a simple account to save your progress across lessons, even on low connectivity.
dashboard_header_body: Use the tabs below to move between your dashboard, studies, queries, tests and career awareness.
dashboard_languages_body: GyanShala currently supports these languages for the interface. More regional languages can be added over time.
dashboard_language_placeholder_body: Content in this language will use the same lessons, but with translated labels and guidance.
dashboard_placeholder_body: This screen will later show your recent activity, progress, and shortcuts to lessons. For now it uses simple placeholder cards.
dashboard_placeholder_card_progress_body: Here you will later see how many lessons you have completed and what to revise next.
dashboard_placeholder_card_languages_bod: Later this area will help you quickly switch languages and jump to your most used classes.
dashboard_placeholder_card_actions_body: Shortcuts to continue your last lesson, open tests, or ask a new query will appear here.
profile_subtitle: View basic learner details and quick links to your queries and career awareness space.
profile_session_info: These details are kept only while the app is open in this session.
profile_queries_body: Go to the Queries tab to ask doubts and see answers in your preferred language.
profile_career_body: Open a simple tool that suggests possible study paths, exams and scholarships using offline career data.
profile_logout_body: End this learning session and go back to the login screen.
profile_language_body: Choose which language is used for buttons, labels, and other text in the app.
studies_header_body: Pick a class, then select a subject to view topic-wise placeholder content. Later we can link each topic to detailed lessons.
studies_english_topic1_body: Practise reading short passages and answering simple questions in English.
studies_english_topic2_body: Revision of nouns, verbs, tenses and simple sentence formation.
studies_english_topic3_body: Learn new everyday words with meanings and example sentences.
studies_english_topic4_body: Short paragraph and letter-writing practice using guided examples.
studies_hindi_topic1_body: Read short Hindi passages and answer simple questions.
studies_hindi_topic2_body: Revision of important Hindi grammar rules like noun, verb, gender and number.
studies_hindi_topic3_body: Practise new Hindi words with meanings and example sentences.
studies_hindi_topic4_body: Practice questions for short paragraph and letter writing.
studies_maths_topic1_body: Addition, subtraction, multiplication and division with easy examples.
studies_maths_topic2_body: Understanding parts of a whole using day-to-day situations.
studies_maths_topic3_body: Introduction to shapes, angles and simple constructions.
studies_maths_topic4_body: Practice story-based sums related to money, time and distance.
studies_science_topic1_body: Overview of local plants, crops and common animals around the village.
studies_science_topic2_body: Basic information about body parts, health and hygiene.
studies_science_topic3_body: Simple explanation of water cycle, air and their importance.
studies_science_topic4_body: Everyday examples of energy, light and simple machines.
studies_social_topic1_body: Understanding family, neighbours and roles in the local community.
studies_social_topic2_body: Introduction to India, states, important symbols and festivals.
studies_social_topic3_body: Short stories about freedom fighters and important events.
studies_social_topic4_body: Reading simple maps and learning directions using village examples.
test_header_body: Here you will later find short quizzes and practice tests that work even on low bandwidth connections.
test_coming_soon_body: This screen will show available tests and your recent scores. Right now it uses placeholder content only.
career_header_body: Fill a few details about your class and stream. The app will suggest some possible study paths, government exams and scholarships using offline data.
career_no_paths_message: No specific paths found for this combination yet. Try a different stream or class.
career_next_step1: Choose a path that matches your interest and strengths.
career_next_step2: Research colleges or institutes in your area.
career_next_step4: If planning for government exams, start preparation in advance.
